NetSolver release for AIJ 2020

Home | GitHub | Licensing


Source code and dataset release for AIJ 2020 paper: Scalable Constraint-based Virtual Data Center Allocation.

Licensing

The source code and dataset is available under MIT license. Please contact authors of SecondNet: A Data Center Network Virtualization Architecture with Bandwidth Guarantees and On the Feasibility of Automation for Bandwidth Allocation Problems in Data Centers for source code of VDCAlloc and Z3-AR, respectively. These are state-of-the-art VDC allocation algorithms we compare to. Their code was available upon request.

Please send any questions, concerns or comments to Sam Bayless or Nodir Kodirov.
